Package com.example.goldencarrot.data.model.waitlist

Interface WaitListConfigurator

All Known Implementing Classes:
WaitList
public interface WaitListConfigurator
The WaitListConfigurator interface defines the behavior of a WaitList. It provides methods to retrieve and update the associated event and the list of users on the waitlist.

  • Method Details

    • setLimitNumber

      void setLimitNumber(int limitNumber)
      Sets the limit number for the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      limitNumber - the maximum number of users allowed on the waitlist

    • getLimitNumber

      Gets the limit number for the waitlist.
      Returns:
      the maximum number of users allowed on the waitlist

    • removeUserFromWaitList

      void removeUserFromWaitList(UserImpl user)
      Removes a user from the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to remove from the waitlist

    • isFull

      boolean isFull()
      Checks if the waitlist is full.
      Returns:
      true if the waitlist is full, false otherwise

    • getEventId

      String getEventId()
      Gets the Event ID associated with this waitlist.
      Returns:
      Event ID

      Sets the Event ID related to an event record in the events database.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the related Event ID

    • getUserMap

      Map<String,String> getUserMap()

      the user map

    • setUserMap

      void setUserMap(Map<String,String> userMap)
      Sets the user map of the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      userMap - the user map to set, with device IDs as keys and statuses as values
